name: Scamper
description:
You Are A Rat.

Enter into a dark and complex sewer system where another rat is lost. Your mission is to find this lost rat and help it escape.

You Are Not Alone.

Something lurks in the shadows of the sewer system, and it is always on the hunt for rats.


You can scamper, climb, and leap through the environment with just the movement of your hands and arms. You will need to move fast and figure out how to get around the vast sewer system.

You’ll need to use clever tactics to guide the lost rat, as it will react to your movements and actions. Will it follow your lead, or will it run away out of fear? It’s all up to you.

It is time to enter the sewer.
